decrees.title: Wild Cards
decrees.description: Every Season, a random team from each Subleague will leave Party Time to become the 5th Playoff team. A best of 3 Wild Card series will happen on Fridays.

decrees.title: Relief
decrees.description: Next Season, the bottom four teams will have Relief. When one of their pitchers gives up 5 runs, they'll immediately be replaced by a pitcher from their Shadows.

decrees.title: Double Jumps
decrees.description: Whenever a team defeats the team currently leading their Division, they'll earn an extra win.

blessings.title: Forever Physical
blessings.description: Keep a Random Player on your team Stable.

blessings.title: Radical Alchemy
blessings.description: Re-rolls your team's three worst players.

blessings.title: Anti Burnout
blessings.description: Your team is protected from Incinerations for the following season.

blessings.title: Replacement Elbows
blessings.description: Where did you find these? Improve 3 random pitchers on your team by one Star (20%)

blessings.title: Promo Code
blessings.description: Enter the code. Recruit a rookie to be the 6th player in your Rotation.

blessings.title: Affinity For Crows
blessings.subheader: Brought to you by @The Society of Internet Blaseball Research@https://sibr.dev/
blessings.description: Oh, that’s what they do. Your team will play 50% Better in Bird Weather.

blessings.title: Home Field Advantage
blessings.description: No place like home. Your Team starts with 1 Run when playing at home.

blessings.title: Composite
blessings.description: Reinforced. Remove the Worst Player from your Rotation. Your Rotation is now shorter.

blessings.title: Lottery Pick
blessings.description: Steal the 14th Most Idolized Player in the League.

blessings.title: Blind Date
blessings.description: Steal the 21st Most Idolized Player on the Leaderboard.

blessings.title: Who? You too?
blessings.description: Never heard of them. Maximize and steal the least Idolized player in the league.

blessings.title: Party Line
blessings.description: Hello? Who's there? Replace a player on your team with the Alternate of a random player from another team.

blessings.title: Thief in the Night
blessings.description: Under the cover of darkness. Steal a Pitcher from a Divisional Opponent's Shadows.

blessings.title: Precognition
blessings.description: Vision of things to come. Improve 3 random hitters on your team by one Star (20%)

blessings.title: New Kid
blessings.description: A warm welcome. Incinerate the Least Idolized Player on Your Team.

blessings.title: Barrel of Tiny Eggs
blessings.description: Feed the Hall Monitor. Fans of your team receive a big barrel of peanuts.

blessings.title: Divisional Swap
blessings.description: Swap your team into the other Division in your Subleague.

blessings.title: Subleague Swap
blessings.description: Swap your team into another Division in the opposite Subleague.

blessings.title: Astroturf
blessings.description: The grass is greener on the other side. Give your team Grass Blood Type.

blessings.title: Base Instincts
blessings.description: Succumb. Give your team Base Blood Type.
